pages.text: Capuchin monkeys are small creatures with black and cream-colored fur around their head that are located in the depths of the jungle. $(br2)You can find four variants:$(li)White Headed Capuchin $(li)Blond Capuchin $(li)Brown Capuchin $(li)Weeper Capuchin$(br2)

Feeding them with eggs will heal them and they can bred feeding them with Maggots. You can feed them with bananas to tame them too. $(br2)If you give them Ancient Darts they will gain piercing damage.$(br2)Sometimes they can drop Banana Peel when they're eating a Banana. Those can be used to make Sopa De Macaco.
